capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been looking into the history of Hogwarts and it seems that Filch has a bit of an... complicated relationship with the school. Apparently, he's been the caretaker for years, but his strict rules and constant grumbling have made him somewhat of a loner. But what's interesting is that despite all this, there are some who believe that Filch actually has a strong affinity for the school, even if it doesn't always show itself in the most positive light.
